headline: Greta Versus the Greedy Grifters
abstract: Why a 17-year-old is a better economist than Steve Mnuchin.
lead_paragraph: Iâ€™ve never been a fan of Davos, that annual gathering of the rich and fatuous. One virtue of the pageant of preening and self-importance, however, is that it brings out the worst in some people, leading them to say things that reveal their vileness for all to see.
